title: Mass convert WMA to MP3 using ffmpeg and ruby
description:
Today I found myself in a situation where I have a few (200+) WMA audio files. Due to personal preference I want MP3, not WMA. So, let’s convert that lot.
What I want to do is convert all those WMA files to constant bitrate 192kbps, stereo mp3 files. (In my case, the WMA files have the required quality to use this settings). ~ The first tool you need is ffmpeg. If you’re on Mac, simple run brew install ffmpeg.
